attributes.action: Renationalisation of the water and energy industries (Gas and Electricity)
attributes.additional_details: Buy Back all the infrastructure, take over all companies and accounts, ensure 100% of profits come back to the people for investment and expansion.
attributes.background: Simply, renationalise the water and energy industries (Gas and Electricity)

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621658
